Name: Grizzly Bear
Details: Grizzly bears are large brown bears found in North America, known for their strength and hibernation.

Name: Polar Bear
Details: Polar bears are native to the Arctic Circle and are excellent swimmers, primarily hunting seals.

Name: American Black Bear
Details: The American black bear is the most common bear species in North America.

Name: Asian Black Bear
Details: Asian black bears are medium-sized bears with a distinctive white chest patch.
